title: Letter to the Honorable Mark E. Fuller, Chief Judge
abstract:
February 4, 2009
The Honorable Mark E. Fuller, Chief Judge
U.S. District Court for the Middle District of Alabama
PO Box 711
Montgomery, Alabama 36101-0711
propord_fuller@almd.uscourts.gov
 
 
 
VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL AND U.S. POSTAL SERVICE
Dear Chief Judge Fuller:
I am writing in the matter of the privacy audit of selected courts, including the United 
States District Court for the Middle District of Alabama.  The preliminary audit was sent 
to the Honorable Mr. Duff at the Administrative Office
